pages.text: $(l)Influential Blocks$() $(br)$(li)Nether Quartz Ore$(li)Nether Gold Ore$(li)Netherrack$(li)Magma Block$(li)Iron Ore$(li)Copper Ore$(li)Gravel

The following array of numbers lists the amount of potential block values required for this gem to emerge. Please note that this is a rough estimate and your results will vary.$(br)[355, 0, 30, 60, 60, 0]
This gem can be injected with tier 1 and tier 2 injector setups.
